H0.text: Which film starring Reese Witherspoon had the same title as a hit by Lynyrd Skynyrd. Free Bird

H1.text: Which film starring Reese Witherspoon had the same title as a hit by Lynyrd Skynyrd. Gimme Three Steps

H2.text: Which film starring Reese Witherspoon had the same title as a hit by Lynyrd Skynyrd. Simple Man

H3.text: Which film starring Reese Witherspoon had the same title as a hit by Lynyrd Skynyrd. Sweet Home Alabama

A4.text: The film takes its title from the 1974 Lynyrd Skynyrd song of the same name.

A5.text: Sweet Home Alabama is a 2002 American romantic comedy-drama film directed by Andy Tennant. Written by C. Jay Cox, it stars Reese Witherspoon, Josh Lucas and Patrick Dempsey.
